sentences.en: 'What have you been, besides a messenger?'
sentences.cn: “ 你除了送信还干过 什么 ? ”

sentences.en: " Got your note. W. B. Yeats as a messenger and all that.
sentences.cn: “ 收到你的字条了, W. B. 叶芝作信使,以及种种一切.

sentences.en: A messenger was despatched to take the news to the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 一名通讯员被派去给士兵送消息。

sentences.en: A messenger was dispatched to take the news to the soldiers at the front.
sentences.cn: 一名通讯员被派遣给前线士兵送消息.

sentences.en: By the time the messenger reached him, the damage had been done.
sentences.cn: 送信人赶到他那儿时, 损失已经造成了.

sentences.en: He dispatched a messenger to tell the king what had happened.
sentences.cn: 他派一使者告诉国王发生了什么事.

sentences.en: He gave the instruction for the document to be sent by messenger.
sentences.cn: 他下令由通信员送出文件。

sentences.en: He sent the order by messenger.
sentences.cn: 他通过邮递员发出订单。

sentences.en: He turned away from the messenger to work at his loom again.
sentences.cn: 他撇下那两个捎口信的来者,又去织布.

sentences.en: I'll order a special messenger to deliver the document.
sentences.cn: 我会派专人把文件送去.

sentences.en: The messenger bent and scratched at his knee where the strapping chafed.
sentences.cn: 送信人弯下腰来，挠着膝部被绑腿磨红的地方。

sentences.en: The messenger boy will run off his legs sooner or later.
sentences.cn: 这个小通讯员迟早会累垮的.

sentences.en: The messenger brought your note today.
sentences.cn: 信使今天带来了你的信.

sentences.en: The robin is the messenger of spring.
There will be a messenger at the airport to collect the photographs from our courier.
sentences.cn: 机场会有一名信使从我们的快递员那儿取走照片。

sentences.en: There will be a messenger at the Airport to collect the photographs from our courier.
sentences.cn: 机场会有一名信使从我们的递送员手中取走照片。

words.tran_cn: 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词
消息传送；通知；信息传送
报信，报告；[通信] 报文

phrases.tran_cn: 将怨气发在报坏消息者身上

trans.tran_cn: 信使，信差，先驱，[军]通信兵，传令兵
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to deliver messages or documents, or someone who takes a message to someone else
